name: 1click-temp-mail-autofill
description: Generate temporary email addresses and auto-fill OTPs and login forms with one click.

scripts.post-build: copy src\manifest.json dist\manifest.json && xcopy src\icons dist\icons /E /I /Y && move dist\src\popup\popup.html dist\popup.html && rmdir dist\src /S /Q

author: Your Name
